Problemi za Barsu, Klaver pauzira četiri do šest nedelja
„Teodosićeva“ povreda

04 Nov 2019

Najmanje četiri, a najverovatnije šest nedelja će sa parketa odsustvovati Barselonin košarkaš Viktor Klaver.
Reprezentativac Španije mora na prinudnu pauzu zbog povrede plantarne fascije. U pitanju je povreda tetive u stopalu koja je nama najpoznatija po Milošu Teodosiću. Srpski plejmejker je dugo mučio muku sa pomenutom povredom i zbog nje je propustio Mundobasket.
Klaver se povredio na prvenstvenom duelu protiv Funelabrade i nije se vraćao na parket. Detaljnim pregledima je utvrđena ruptura tetive u stopalu i sada mu predstoji period mirovanja. To znači da Svetislav Pešić skoro sigurno neće moći mesec dana da računa na usluge krilnog centra reprezentacije Španije koji podjednako uspešno pokriva i poziciju „trojke“.
Klaver je u dosadašnjih pet kola Evrolige prosečno beležio 6,2 poena i 4,2 skoka po meču.
(FOTO: MN Press)

Trouble for Barca, Claver pauses for four to six weeks
Teodosic's injury

04 Nov 2019

Barcelona basketball player Viktor Claver will be absent from the floor for at least four, and probably six weeks.
The Spanish national team has to take a break because of a plantar fascia injury. It is a tendon injury in the foot, which is best known to us by Milos Teodosic. The Serbian playmaker has been suffering for so long with the aforementioned injury and has missed Mundobasket because of it.
Claver injured himself in the championship match against Funelabrada and did not return to the floor. Detailed examination has identified a rupture of the tendon in the foot and is now waiting for a rest period. This means that Svetislav Pesic will almost certainly not be able to count for a month on the services of the wing of the national team of Spain, which equally successfully covers the position of "troika".
Claver has averaged 6.2 points and 4.2 rebounds per game in the five Euroleague rounds so far.
(PHOTO: MN Press)
